tool.name: imagertask
tool.description: imagertask is a tool that accomplishes common tasks in synthesis processing.

method.name: clean
method.description: Form images from visibilities. Handles continuum and spectral line cubes.

param.name: vis
param.description: name of input visibility file (MS)

param.name: alg
param.description: Algorithm to use (clark, hogbom, csclean, csfast). Default is clark.

param.name: niter
param.description: Number of iterations. Default=1000.

param.name: gain
param.description: The minor iteration loop gain. Default is 0.1.

param.name: threshold
param.description: Threshold flux level at which to stop cleaning (in Jy). Default is 0.Jy.

param.name: residual
param.description: name of residual image. Default is model name concatenated with ".residual".

param.name: image
param.description: name of restored image. Default is model name concatenated with ".restored".

param.name: model
param.description: name of model image. No value.

param.name: mask
param.description: name of mask image. No value.

param.name: mode
param.description: Type of processing (channel or velocity)

param.name: nchan
param.description: With mode, this defines the number of channels for mapping of visibilities to image channels

param.name: start
param.description: With mode, this defines the starting channel for mapping of visibilities to image channels

param.name: width
param.description: With mode, this defines the width of channels for mapping of visibilities to image channels

param.name: step
param.description: With mode, this defines the step of channels for mapping of visibilities to image channels

param.name: imsize
param.description: The size of the output image (pixels).

param.name: cell
param.description: The image cell size (arcseconds).

param.name: stokes
param.description: Stokes params to image. Default is 'I'. Allowed: I, IV, IQU, IQUV

param.name: fieldid
param.description: Field IDs to include. Default is 1. Allows a vector of available field ids.

param.name: spwid
param.description: Spectral Window IDs to include. Default is 1. Allows a vector of available spectral window ids.

param.name: weighting
param.description: Type of weighting (natural, uniform, briggs, radial). Default is uniform.

param.name: rmode
param.description: Mode of Briggs weighting ('norm', 'abs', 'none'). Default is 'none'.

param.name: robust
param.description: Parameter in briggs weighting. Range -2.0 to 2.0. Default is 0.0.

method.name: mosaic
method.description: Form images from multi-field visibilities. Handles continuum and spectral line cubes.

param.name: vis
param.description: name of input visibility file (MS)

param.name: alg
param.description: Algorithm to use (mfclark,mfhogbom). Default is 'mfclark'.

param.name: niter
param.description: Number of iterations. Default=1000.

param.name: gain
param.description: The minor iteration loop gain. Default is 0.1.

param.name: threshold
param.description: Threshold flux level at which to stop cleaning (in Jy). Default is 0.Jy.

param.name: residual
param.description: name of residual image. Default is model name concatenated with ".residual".

param.name: image
param.description: name of restored image. Default is model name concatenated with ".restored".

param.name: model
param.description: name of model image. No value.

param.name: mask
param.description: name of mask image. No value.

param.name: mode
param.description: Type of processing (channel or velocity)

param.name: gridfn
param.description: Type of gridding function (spheroidal wave, box car, primary beam

param.name: grid
param.description: Type of gridding mosaic or ft (standard interferometry)

param.name: nchan
param.description: With mode, this defines the number of channels for mapping of visibilities to image channels

param.name: start
param.description: With mode, this defines the starting channel for mapping of visibilities to image channels

param.name: width
param.description: With mode, this defines the width of channels for mapping of visibilities to image channels

param.name: step
param.description: With mode, this defines the step of channels for mapping of visibilities to image channels

param.name: imsize
param.description: The size of the output image (pixels).

param.name: cell
param.description: The image cell size (arcseconds).

param.name: stokes
param.description: Stokes params to image. Default is 'I'. Allowed: I, IV, IQU, IQUV

param.name: fieldid
param.description: Field IDs to include. Default is 1. Allows a vector of available field ids.

param.name: reffieldid
param.description: Reference Field IDs to use. Default is 1.

param.name: spwid
param.description: Spectral Window IDs to include. Default is 1. Allows a vector of available spectral window ids.

param.name: weighting
param.description: Type of weighting (natural, uniform, briggs, radial). Default is uniform.

param.name: mosweight
param.description: Type of weighting used for the mosaic. T means that each field will be weighted individually.

param.name: rmode
param.description: Mode of Briggs weighting ('norm', 'abs', 'none'). Default is 'none'.

param.name: robust
param.description: Parameter in briggs weighting. Range -2.0 to 2.0. Default is 0.0.

param.name: minpb
param.description: Minimum PB level to use. Default is 0.1.

param.name: scaletype
param.description: Image plane flux scale type ('NONE', 'SAULT'). Default is 'NONE'.

param.name: stoplargenegatives
param.description: Stop large negatives. Default=-1.

param.name: cyclefactor
param.description: Cycle factor. Default=1.5.

param.name: cyclespeedup
param.description: Cycle speedup. Default=2.
